    • Constructor Detail

      • Student

        public Student()

      • Student

        public Student​(java.lang.String name)

      • Student

        public Student​(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String status)
        Creates a new Student given the name and class status.
        • If the class status is not Freshman, Sophomore, Junior, or Senior, it will default to Freshman.
        Parameters:
        name - name
        status - class status (Freshman, Sophomore, Junior, or Senior)
